Class AbstractModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PerfectModel

    abstract class AbstractModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel
    The Abstract class implements the Maze interface which implements most of methods except buildMaze().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractModel(int row, int column, int randomSeed, Difficulty difficulty, int numOfPlayer)
      The constructor of AbstractMaze with the maze size, start point, end point, Player and a Random() seed used to generate pseudo-random numbers to reproduce the same "unique" mazes each time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractModel

        protected AbstractModel(int row,
                        int column,
                        int randomSeed,
                        Difficulty difficulty,
                        int numOfPlayer)
        The constructor of AbstractMaze with the maze size, start point, end point, Player and a Random() seed used to generate pseudo-random numbers to reproduce the same "unique" mazes each time.
        Parameters:
        row - row number of the maze
        column - column number of the maze
        randomSeed - Random() seed for setting golds and thieves

    • Method Detail

      • createMaze

        private java.lang.String[][] createMaze(int row,
                                        int column,
                                        int size,
                                        int randomSeed,
                                        int numOfPits,
                                        int numOfBats)
        Initialize the cells of the maze with golds and thieves.
        Parameters:
        row - row number of the maze
        column - column number of the maze
        size - number of the cells in the maze which equals to row times column
        randomSeed - Random() seed for setting golds and thieves
        Returns:
        2d-int array of maze cells

      • createConnections

        private java.util.List<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> createConnections(int size)
        Initialize the connections of cells.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the connections which equals to the number of cells
        Returns:
        the list of set

      • buildPerfectMaze

        protected boolean buildPerfectMaze(int seed)
        Helper function to build the perfect maze.
        Parameters:
        seed - Random() seed for selecting random cells to do union-find
        Returns:
        true: build successfully; false: build unsuccessfully

      • find

        private int find(int x)
        Helper function for Union-Find which find the father of the cell.
        Parameters:
        x - the index of the cell
        Returns:
        the "top" father of the cell

      • union

        private void union(int x,
                   int y)
        Helper function for Union-Find which combine cell x and cell y into a same set and add connections between x and y if x and y are not in the same set.
        Parameters:
        x - the index of the cell
        y - the index of the cell
